attributes.action: Give me 14 billion pounds, as I'll Look after it better than Gordon Brown and that gimp Cameron
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I would enjoy being incredibly rich and not having to work longer than everyone else in europe whilst subsidising their lifestyles.
lets not waste anymore money on global warming - the millenium bug of our time - and just give me some cash.
Lets face it Britain I couldn't waste it any quicker than the herd of numpties we get to pick from at election time.
14 billion should just about see me right!
I'm putting this petition up till Christmas, I think it'll be nice to get the cash then.

Thanks

Matt

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
